name: Death Trap
description: Death Trap is a side-scrolling platform game with light puzzle-solving elements that usually don't go further than finding levers to get through to the next part of the map. The theme of the game is medieval fantasy and it takes place in a castle (divide into five levels) which is where the trap in the title comes from. The trap has been set up by the magician king Shankriya and has been existing for five centuries. It's the players job to make things right again. The game has a wide variety of enemies from ghosts to fireball throwing magicians. Defeating some enemies gives the player the player a flask with some liquid that can be converted into spells and such.

shot.caption: Found a chest and attacked by a ghost.
A wide variety of monsters inhabit the game.
They weren't kidding when they named it Death Trap. Here's a fire trap from a chest.
Hidden spike trap to the left. You can't see these until they pop up under  you and instantly kill you.
I think these are the skeletons of former players...
One little monster causes your whole screen to go dark. This makes avoiding traps extra hard.
You can create spells from potions you pick up. Right now I don't have any potion materials.
Here I have enough to cast fireballs. This gives you a ranged fireball weapon, which is a huge improvement from the tiny knife you start with.
The Summon Friend spell, summons a little flying monster to help you. You can see him in the top right. He kills enemies and picks up potions for you.
